snippet: Rudolph W. Giuliani has put his Rolodex behind Joseph J. Lhota, the recent Metropolitan Transit Authority chief whom he sees as a pragmatist and a contender.
abstract: Former New York City Mayor Rudolph W Giuliani is backing Joseph J Lhota, ex-deputy in his administration, as a replacement for departing Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, with a single-mindedness that borders on fervor; for Giuliani, Lhota candidacy represents coveted chance to reassert his stamp on city he transformed in 1990s.
lead_paragraph: Rudolph W. Giuliani has put his Rolodex behind Joseph J. Lhota, the recent Metropolitan Transit Authority chief whom he sees as a pragmatist and a contender.

headline.seo: For Giuliani, a Chance to Put New Stamp on City
headline.main: Giuliani Ready to Use Muscle to Put His Man in Mayor’s Seat
headline.print_headline: Giuliani Ready to Use Muscle To Put His Man in Mayor’s Seat
